addLabelControl.description: Control for adding new labels (React component or element)

aria-label.description: Aria label for label group that does not have a category name

categoryName.description: Category name text for the label group category.  If this prop is supplied the label group with have a label and category styling applied

children.description: Content rendered inside the label group. Should be <Label> elements. (React component or element)

className.description: Additional classes added to the label item

collapsedText.description: Customizable template string. Use variable "${remaining}" for the overflow label count.

defaultIsOpen.description: Flag for having the label group default to expanded

editableTextAreaProps.description: Additional props passed to the editable textarea. (Type: any)

hasEditableTextArea.description: Flag indicating the editable label group should be appended with a textarea.

isClosable.description: Flag if label group can be closed

isCompact.description: Flag indicating the labels in the group are compact

isEditable.description: Flag indicating contained labels are editable. Allows spacing for a text input after the labels.

isVertical.description: Flag to implement a vertical layout

numLabels.description: Set number of labels to show before overflow

onClick.description: Function that is called when clicking on the label group close button (Function: (event: React.MouseEvent) => void)

tooltipPosition.description:
Position of the tooltip which is displayed if the category name text is longer (Type: | TooltipPosition
| 'auto'
| 'top'
| 'bottom'
| 'left'
| 'right'
| 'top-start'
| 'top-end'
| 'bottom-start'
| 'bottom-end'
| 'left-start'
| 'left-end'
| 'right-start'
| 'right-end')
